attributes.action: Vehicle excise duty should be based on carcinogen levels.
attributes.additional_details: Vehicle excise duty should be based on carcinogenic sooty particulate emission levels rather than on colourless non-carcinogenic CO2.  The particulates can cause cancer and aggravate asthma.  Motorists are tired of being taxed on colourless CO2 when sooty smoky exhausts are often taxed less.
